text: My message this morning at Davos to CNBC was that Europe needs M&A and a functioning banking union to grow. This stalemate is something we can no longer afford and we must realise that the banking sector has changed in 10 years. The risks are more controlled and regions of Central and Eastern Europe are showing huge M&A promise.  We need strong banks that are fulfilling their role as engines of growth.
